titles: To the honnorable the Commons of the realme of England, assembled in Parliament Explanation. Concerning certaine expedients by vvhich the state of England may reape notable advantage. Baltazar Gerbier knight.
author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
